name: Artist
description:
it's really short and it's probably the crappiest story ever lol

it's 4 am lol

controls:

z - interact

s - stats

x - exit (menus/enemy selection)

arrow keys - move

1/2/3 - main menu options

credits:

shoutout to the peeps at the discord yall are cool

loading and saving is slow because i use a really inefficient "for" loop
